tool.name: Scale Metagenome
tool.description: Converts metagenomic relative abundance back to sequence counts
tool.help:
Converts metagenomic relative abundance back to sequence counts.
Usage: scale_metagenome.py [options] Options: -s, --input_seq_depth_file, An input tab-delimited table, with samples as the first column and an integer sequencing depth as the second -i, --input_count_table, The input trait counts on per otu basis in biom format (can be gzipped) -o, --output_metagenome_table, The output file for the scaled metagenome
